description.original: Reminder plugin for Obsidian. This plugin adds feature to manage TODOs with reminder.
description.translation: Reminder plugin for Obsidian. This plugin adds feature to manage TODOs with reminder.

dict..desc(\"Time when a reminder with no tim: .desc("Time when a reminder with no time part will show"
dict..desc(\"Line-separated list of remind me: .desc("Line-separated list of remind me later items"
dict..desc(\"When toggled, Dates link to dail: .desc("When toggled, Dates link to daily notes."
dict..desc(\"Reminder format for generated re: .desc("Reminder format for generated reminder by calendar popup"
dict..desc(\"Use custom emoji ⏰ instead of \\: .desc("Use custom emoji ⏰ instead of \u{1F4C5} and distinguish between reminder date/time and Tasks Plugin's due date."
dict..desc(\"If checked, tags(#xxx) are remov: .desc("If checked, tags(#xxx) are removed from the reminder list view and notification."
dict..desc(\"The minimum amount of time (in s: .desc("The minimum amount of time (in seconds) after a key is typed that it will be identified as notifiable."
dict..desc(\"Interval(in seconds) to periodic: .desc("Interval(in seconds) to periodically check whether or not you should be notified of reminders.  You will need to restart Obsidian for this setting to take effect."
dict..name(\"Distinguish between reminder dat: .name("Distinguish between reminder date and due date"
dict..desc(\"Use custom emoji \\u23F0 instead: .desc("Use custom emoji \u23F0 instead of \u{1F4C5} and distinguish between reminder date/time and Tasks Plugin's due date.")
